text: Harold Viets Camp Jr. (March 31, 1935 â€“ February 14, 2022) was an American lawyer and politician. Camp was born in Hartford, Connecticut. He was in the Connecticut House of Representatives from 1968 to 1974 and was a Republican. Camp died in the Stony Creek area of Branford, Connecticut on February 14, 2022 at the age of 86.Harold Viets Camp-obituary ==References== Category:1935 births Category:2022 deaths Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Politicians from Hartford, Connecticut Category:Lawyers from Connecticut Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Harold V. Camp
